entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.6°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
